About me

2013

I am a web designer, developer and film aficionado. Not necessarily in that order. I love building things on the web and designing for the best possible experience across all devices and contexts.

I found my calling in web design a couple of years ago and I've been learning nonstop ever since. Follow me on Twitter, connect with me on LinkedIn or send me an email.

Ma Skillz

  • CSS (and Sass)
  • HTML
  • JQuery
  • PHP
  • Wordpress
  • iOS dev
  • Photoshop
  • Illustrator
  • inDesign
  • Paper & Pencil
  • User Testing

This website was built using Jekyll and made responsive to make sure you enjoy it no matter where you are.
